<description>: The collection of all data related to a specific patient or case in the context of a specific dataset or experiment.

Information related to the condition(s) of a case within the context of a particular study (e.g., a medical diagnoses, comorbidities). This includes a snapshot of the case's status with respect to certain diseases, disorders, symptoms, injuries, or illnesses within the context of the study.
A collection of data files in a project.
A package of image files and metadata related to a CR imaging series to which one or more computed radiograph (CR) instances belong.
<systemProperties>: id, project_id, state, created_datetime, updated_datetime, file_state, error_type
<required>: submitter_id, type, file_name, file_size, md5sum, data_format, data_type, data_category
